<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
TRADE
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/08/02/trump-announces-tariffs-nearly-chinese-imports?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Trade War: Play Next Episode?
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Trade War: Play Next Episode?" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiIxNTY0Njk0ODE3LmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im1vcm5pbmdicmV3LW9zbG8iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Never one to let us cruise into a summer weekend, President Trump logged onto Twitter Thursday and hit us with a surprise <a href="https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1156979445565202433?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">tariff announcement</a>:</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">The damage: </strong></span><span>A 10% tariff on $300 billion of Chinese goods. That would be on top of the $250 billion already covered by tariffs. </span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">The deadline: </strong></span><span>September 1. Negotiations between the U.S. and China re-re-re-re-resume later that month.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">These aren’t just tariffs on steel beams thrice-removed from consumers. The new round targets “practically all the groups of products not hit previously,” according to the <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/trump-to-impose-additional-10-tariff-on-chinese-goods-11564681310?mod=djemalertNEWS&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">WSJ</a>. That means it'd be especially painful for <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2019/08/01/retail-stocks-tank-as-they-could-take-the-biggest-hit-from-the-new-round-of-china-tariffs.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">retailers</a>. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Markets immediately went sliding </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Oil prices <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-global-oil/oil-crashes-6-as-trump-announces-additional-tariffs-on-chinese-imports-idUSKCN1UR32F?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">fell</a> more than 7%, their worst day in years. Stocks slid from green to red. Bond yields hit <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/global-stocks-waver-on-fed-policy-outlook-11564647018?mod=djemalertNEWS&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">new lows</a> for the year. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">This is a chart of the Dow Jones Industrial Average yesterday. Can you spot when Trump turned it into a cross-section of the Grand Canyon? </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><img src="https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/byQCW8p3M-htx4J8OKQu2AH4dDiNfo9LlVnwmjwP2oTlY0BFlsGXQde_Zu_jAgDC92vxB2-UHblevSpz_BI6YdxQakOc0ZNBOyc8lV8VN2uA95d0KVcYfVOaxbGP5Xf4T6bDchjQ" class="img-responsive" width="540" style="width:100% !important;max-width: 540px;" alt=""></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><em><sup class="sub-text"><a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/quote/INDU:IND?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Bloomberg</a></sup> </em></p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">How this happened</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Remember Wednesday? Skies were blue, the Fed <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/stories/the-fed-cut-is-the-deepest/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">cut short-term interest rates</a> (in part because of the trade war), and Fed Chair Jerome Powell said, “trade policy tensions nearly boiled over in May and June but now appear to have returned to a simmer.” That’s just asking for it. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">It’s true, there had been movement.</strong> U.S. and Chinese officials met in Shanghai earlier this week after a monthslong break in trade talks. On Thursday, Trump said the meetings were “<a href="https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1156979450560548864?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">constructive</a>.” </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">But there’s still a ton of daylight between the two countries. In his tweets announcing the tariffs, the president said...</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>China didn’t follow through on its promise to buy “large quantities” of U.S. agricultural products.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>President Xi failed to stop fentanyl sales to the U.S.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>There’s still ongoing “positive dialogue.” </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Big picture:</strong> Trump has used tariffs as a negotiating tactic before, but with one month’s notice, businesses will need to start prepping STAT.</p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
CONSUMER
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/08/02/gm-kellogg-figured-american-consumer?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Trucks and Waffles, That’s What America Does
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="Trucks and Waffles, That’s What America Does" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=447 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/l0HlESI0mzccH7ai4/giphy.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="Trucks and Waffles, That’s What America Does" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/l0HlESI0mzccH7ai4/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Some think the American consumer’s tastes are elusive, but we think we’ve figured it out. She wants to eat plant-based waffle alternatives while driving an SUV. Both <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-kellogg-results/kellogg-results-beat-forecasts-on-north-america-demand-shares-surge-idUSKCN1UR4MD?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Kellogg</a> (+9.29%) and <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2019/08/01/gm-earnings-q2-2019.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">GM</a> (-0.47%) beat Q2 earnings estimates yesterday with help from key products. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Kellogg</strong> has two of its brands, Eggo and Morningstar, to thank for a 1% North American net sales increase, the biggest since 2013.  </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>CEO Steve Cahillane pointed to Morningstar’s plant-based meat alternatives and Eggo’s new high-protein waffles and frozen french toast. “We’re literally selling every Eggo that we can make,” he said. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>But don’t forget that bottom line: Kellogg’s net income dropped 52% from costs related to 1) restructuring efforts in Europe and North America and 2) divesting Keebler biscuits. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">For GM</strong>, the company’s more profitable pickup trucks and crossovers goosed sales, counteracting a slowdown in China. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Crossover sales increased 17% annually to a Q2 record. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The roomy GMC Acadia had its best first half to a year ever.</span></li>
</ul>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
INTERNATIONAL
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/08/02/death-coffee-king-says-india-s-tax-regime?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
India's IRS And a Coffee King's Death
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">This week, a tragic incident highlighted broader struggles in India's business community.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Here’s the “too sad; didn’t read”: </strong>Two local fishermen <a href="http://www.forbesindia.com/article/the-ccd-saga/vg-siddharthas-body-found-last-rites-to-be-held-in-chikmaglur/54599/1?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">discovered</a> the body of V.G. Siddhartha, founder of Coffee Day Enterprises, in southern India’s Netravati River Wednesday morning. A <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2019-07-31/death-of-the-coffee-king-reveals-strain-of-india-s-cash-crunch?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">letter</a> sent to the company’s senior management, which is unverified but supposedly written by Siddhartha, expressed anguish over his company’s liquidity crunch.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Cafe Coffee Day is a retail coffee chain that </span><span><a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2019/07/31/business/india-vg-siddhartha-dead-cafe-coffee-day.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">beat</a></span><span> Starbucks to become a fixture on Indian street corners. Its success earned Siddhartha the nickname “the coffee king of India.” </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The backstory:</strong> India’s government is facing slowing economic growth and scanty cash. To boost reserves, its Income Tax Department is <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-coffeedayenterprises-ceo-backlash-ana/coffee-barons-death-fuels-india-inc-anger-over-government-crackdown-on-wrongdoing-idUSKCN1UR49T?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">coming down hard</a> on businesses, including Coffee Day, to pay taxes and repay loans. The former director of IT giant Infosys has called the aggressive push by collectors “tax terrorism.” </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">And Siddhartha likely isn’t the first to suffer severe anxiety over mounting financial issues. There have been stories of farmers committing suicide after failing to refinance loans; the tycoon’s just the first c-suite type.</p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
GAMING
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/08/02/ninja-switching-teams?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
The Twitch Switch
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="The Twitch Switch" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://cdn.images.express.co.uk/img/dynamic/143/590x/Ninja-Mixer-Stream-1160730.webp?r=1564687647371">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Mixer</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Russ to the Rockets? Kawhi and Paul George to the Clippers? Yawn. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">This summer’s biggest move in sports went down yesterday, when mega-popular <em>Fortnite</em> gamer Tyler “Ninja” Blevins dropped his own Woj bomb: He’s <a href="https://www.theverge.com/2019/8/1/20750393/ninja-mixer-exclusive-twitch-fortnite-streaming-gaming-announcement?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">switching</a> streaming platforms from Amazon’s Twitch to Microsoft’s Mixer. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">If you haven’t heard of Ninja, he’s the thumbs of the video game streaming world. On Twitch, the largest video game streaming platform by far, he has <a href="https://www.twitch.tv/ninja/followers?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">14.7 million</a> followers. Ninja’s sponsors include Red Bull and Adidas, and he <a href="https://edition.cnn.com/2018/12/31/tech/ninja-fortnite-stream/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">said</a> he made close to $10 million in 2018.  </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>Ninja is a big (and probably expensive) get for Microsoft, where gaming <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2019/08/01/tyler-ninja-blevins-moves-from-twitch-to-microsoft-mixer.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">accounts for</a> about 10% of total revenue. But Mixer needs better content to become a contender in streaming. It has <a href="https://www.espn.com/esports/story/_/id/27302820/gaming-megastar-ninja-leaves-twitch-mixer?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">10 million monthly users</a> to Twitch’s 100+ million, though it is five years younger.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>Ninja’s first livestream on Mixer will be from Lollapalooza today. We know our Chicago readers will be there in force.</p>

<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
QUIZ
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/08/02/brew-s-weekly-news-quiz-august-2?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
I’m Gonna Quiz ’Til I Can’t no More
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Won the Democratic debates. Crushed Fed bingo. Cannot wait for <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1Expe7hf6MU&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333"><em>The Irishman</em></a>. It’s the Brew’s Weekly News Quiz. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">1. <strong style="color:#000">A single hacker </strong>accessed personal info on <span>106 million credit card holders or credit card applicants from which bank? </span></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">2.<strong style="color:#000"> Which number is greater? </strong>The number of trees planted in Ethiopia last Monday or the number of people in China who watched the NBA last year? </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">3.<strong style="color:#000"> Guess the skyline.</strong> Hint: Quicken Loans founder Dan Gilbert has poured $5.6 billion into redeveloping the downtown since 2011. 70 points of extra credit if you know the city’s nickname. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><img src="https://morningbrew-oslo.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/1564519006.jpg" class="img-responsive" width="540" style="width:100% !important;max-width: 540px;" alt=""></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">4.<strong style="color:#000"> Fill in the blanks: </strong>________ dethroned ________ as the company with the most cash on hand. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">5. <strong style="color:#000">The London Stock Exchange</strong> agreed to pay $27 billion for a financial information company whose Eikon terminals rival Bloomberg’s. What’s the company’s name? </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><sup class="sub-text"><strong style="color:#000"><em>Answers: </em></strong><em>1) Capital One 2) 490 million China NBA viewers > 350 million trees planted 3) Detroit, “Motor City” 4) Alphabet, Apple 5) </em><em>Refinitiv</em></sup></p>

width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" class=\"story-header-image\" src=\"https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiIxNTY0Njk0ODE3LmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im1vcm5pbmdicmV3LW9zbG8iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eFrancis Scialabba\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eNever one to let us cruise into a summer weekend, President Trump logged onto Twitter Thursday and hit us with a surprise \u003ca href=\"https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1156979445565202433?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003etariff announcement\u003c/a\u003e:\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe damage: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eA 10% tariff on $300 billion of Chinese goods. That would be on top of the $250 billion already covered by tariffs. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe deadline: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eSeptember 1. Negotiations between the U.S. and China re-re-re-re-resume later that month.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThese aren’t just tariffs on steel beams thrice-removed from consumers. The new round targets “practically all the groups of products not hit previously,” according to the \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/trump-to-impose-additional-10-tariff-on-chinese-goods-11564681310?mod=djemalertNEWS\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eWSJ\u003c/a\u003e. That means it'd be especially painful for \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2019/08/01/retail-stocks-tank-as-they-could-take-the-biggest-hit-from-the-new-round-of-china-tariffs.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eretailers\u003c/a\u003e. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eMarkets immediately went sliding \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eOil prices \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-global-oil/oil-crashes-6-as-trump-announces-additional-tariffs-on-chinese-imports-idUSKCN1UR32F?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003efell\u003c/a\u003e more than 7%, their worst day in years. Stocks slid from green to red. Bond yields hit \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/global-stocks-waver-on-fed-policy-outlook-11564647018?mod=djemalertNEWS\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003enew lows\u003c/a\u003e for the year. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThis is a chart of the Dow Jones Industrial Average yesterday. Can you spot when Trump turned it into a cross-section of the Grand Canyon? \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cimg src=\"https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/byQCW8p3M-htx4J8OKQu2AH4dDiNfo9LlVnwmjwP2oTlY0BFlsGXQde_Zu_jAgDC92vxB2-UHblevSpz_BI6YdxQakOc0ZNBOyc8lV8VN2uA95d0KVcYfVOaxbGP5Xf4T6bDchjQ\" class=\"img-responsive\" width=\"540\" style=\"width:100% !important;max-width: 540px;\" alt=\"\"\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cem\u003e\u003csup class=\"sub-text\"\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/quote/INDU:IND?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eBloomberg\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/sup\u003e \u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eHow this happened\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eRemember Wednesday? Skies were blue, the Fed \u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/stories/the-fed-cut-is-the-deepest/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ecut short-term interest rates\u003c/a\u003e (in part because of the trade war), and Fed Chair Jerome Powell said, “trade policy tensions nearly boiled over in May and June but now appear to have returned to a simmer.” That’s just asking for it. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eIt’s true, there had been movement.\u003c/strong\u003e U.S. and Chinese officials met in Shanghai earlier this week after a monthslong break in trade talks. On Thursday, Trump said the meetings were “\u003ca href=\"https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1156979450560548864?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003econstructive\u003c/a\u003e.” \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBut there’s still a ton of daylight between the two countries. In his tweets announcing the tariffs, the president said...\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eChina didn’t follow through on its promise to buy “large quantities” of U.S. agricultural products.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003ePresident Xi failed to stop fentanyl sales to the U.S.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThere’s still ongoing “positive dialogue.” \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBig picture:\u003c/strong\u003e Trump has used tariffs as a negotiating tactic before, but with one month’s notice, businesses will need to start prepping STAT.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS style=\"color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;\"\u003e\n\u003cfont color=\"#000000\"\u003e\nIndia's IRS And a Coffee King's Death\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThis week, a tragic incident highlighted broader struggles in India's business community.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eHere’s the “too sad; didn’t read”: \u003c/strong\u003eTwo local fishermen \u003ca href=\"http://www.forbesindia.com/article/the-ccd-saga/vg-siddharthas-body-found-last-rites-to-be-held-in-chikmaglur/54599/1?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ediscovered\u003c/a\u003e the body of V.G. Siddhartha, founder of Coffee Day Enterprises, in southern India’s Netravati River Wednesday morning. A \u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2019-07-31/death-of-the-coffee-king-reveals-strain-of-india-s-cash-crunch?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eletter\u003c/a\u003e sent to the company’s senior management, which is unverified but supposedly written by Siddhartha, expressed anguish over his company’s liquidity crunch.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eCafe Coffee Day is a retail coffee chain that \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2019/07/31/business/india-vg-siddhartha-dead-cafe-coffee-day.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebeat\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e Starbucks to become a fixture on Indian street corners. Its success earned Siddhartha the nickname “the coffee king of India.” \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe backstory:\u003c/strong\u003e India’s government is facing slowing economic growth and scanty cash. To boost reserves, its Income Tax Department is \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-coffeedayenterprises-ceo-backlash-ana/coffee-barons-death-fuels-india-inc-anger-over-government-crackdown-on-wrongdoing-idUSKCN1UR49T?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ecoming down hard\u003c/a\u003e on businesses, including Coffee Day, to pay taxes and repay loans. The former director of IT giant Infosys has called the aggressive push by collectors “tax terrorism.” \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAnd Siddhartha likely isn’t the first to suffer severe anxiety over mounting financial issues. There have been stories of farmers committing suicide after failing to refinance loans; the tycoon’s just the first c-suite type.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding-top: 12px;\"\u003e\n\u003ca href=\"https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2F2019%2F08%2F02%2Fdeath-coffee-king-says-india-s-tax-regime\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"text-decoration: none;\" class=\"\"\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"\" style=\"display: inline-block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" class=\"story-header-image\" src=\"https://cdn.images.express.co.uk/img/dynamic/143/590x/Ninja-Mixer-Stream-1160730.webp?r=1564687647371\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eMixer\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eRuss to the Rockets? Kawhi and Paul George to the Clippers? Yawn. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThis summer’s biggest move in sports went down yesterday, when mega-popular \u003cem\u003eFortnite\u003c/em\u003e gamer Tyler “Ninja” Blevins dropped his own Woj bomb: He’s \u003ca href=\"https://www.theverge.com/2019/8/1/20750393/ninja-mixer-exclusive-twitch-fortnite-streaming-gaming-announcement?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eswitching\u003c/a\u003e streaming platforms from Amazon’s Twitch to Microsoft’s Mixer. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIf you haven’t heard of Ninja, he’s the thumbs of the video game streaming world. On Twitch, the largest video game streaming platform by far, he has \u003ca href=\"https://www.twitch.tv/ninja/followers?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e14.7 million\u003c/a\u003e followers. Ninja’s sponsors include Red Bull and Adidas, and he \u003ca href=\"https://edition.cnn.com/2018/12/31/tech/ninja-fortnite-stream/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esaid\u003c/a\u003e he made close to $10 million in 2018.  \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eNinja is a big (and probably expensive) get for Microsoft, where gaming \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2019/08/01/tyler-ninja-blevins-moves-from-twitch-to-microsoft-mixer.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eaccounts for\u003c/a\u003e about 10% of total revenue. But Mixer needs better content to become a contender in streaming. It has \u003ca href=\"https://www.espn.com/esports/story/_/id/27302820/gaming-megastar-ninja-leaves-twitch-mixer?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e10 million monthly users\u003c/a\u003e to Twitch’s 100+ million, though it is five years younger.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003eNinja’s first livestream on Mixer will be from Lollapalooza today.
